function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate representation of local population's lifestyle and energy consumption habits","Impact":"Higher energy consumption, potential waste of resources","Mitigation":"Collect and use accurate data on the local population's lifestyle and energy consumption habits","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, smart meters, data analytics tools","People":"Local population, energy consumers","Owner":"Research institutions, energy agencies, government"},{"Description":"Habit of leaving lights on when rooms are unoccupied due to cheap electricity","Impact":"Excessive energy consumption, financial burden on government","Mitigation":"Implement occupancy-based lighting control systems, educate occupants on energy conservation","Technologies":"Occupancy sensors, smart lighting systems, energy monitoring devices","People":"Occupants, government","Owner":"Building owners, government"}]}
